Package com.dhemery.victor

Interact with iOS devices, applications, and views.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IosApplication
    Interacts with an application running on an iOS device.
    IosDevice
    A driver that interacts with a simulated iOS device.
    IosView
    A driver that interacts with a set of views in an iOS application.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Igor
    Identifies views using an Igor pattern.
    IosViewIdentifier
    An identifier that identifies a set of views in an iOS application.
    Shelley
    Identifies views using a Shelley pattern.
    UIQuery
    Identifies views using a UIQuery pattern.
    Victor
    A Victor environment configured according to specified configuration options.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    IosApplicationOrientation
    Enumeration of application orientations.

Package com.dhemery.victor Description

Interact with iOS devices, applications, and views. Victor is designed for use with a Frank server embedded into the iOS application. Victor includes an API and reasonable implementations to use all of the Frank server's features through Java.

Victor's primary API includes:

  • IosApplication: a driver that interacts with a running iOS application.
  • IosDevice: a driver that interacts with a simulated iOS device.
  • IosView: a driver that interacts with a set of views in an iOS application.
  • IosViewIdentifier: a mechanism for identifying iOS views.
  • Victor: a factory that constructs a complete Victor environment based on a small set of configuration options.
